Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory187.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: 'Is this the thing you told me about?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Camu taps the headphones in front of him with his finger, seemingly trying to find out whether they truly block out sound.'}
{2: 'Yep, the guide says this is the right place.', 3: '8'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: '"Guess What I\'m Trying to Say?"... What a weird name. I mean, am I supposed to NOT understand what you say?', 4: '1'}
{2: "It's because you'll be wearing these headphones with music playing when I try to talk to you.", 3: '11'}
{2: 'You have to guess what I say based on my gestures and lip movements.', 3: '12'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: '...Gotcha. And we get a premium voucher for the food court, if we get it all right, right?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "Let's get the show on the road, then.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'According to the rules, both players need to take turns swapping roles. Camu chooses to be the one guessing first.'}

{3: 'The headphones prove to be of excellent quality, with music playing at a comfortable volume rather than being jarringly loud. The noise-canceling design perfectly blocks out all external sounds.'}
{3: "At the staff member's hand signal, the challenge begins."}
{2: 'The first phrase coming up is...', 3: '18'}
{2: '"I\'ll definitely be home at noon."', 3: '19'}
{3: 'To make it easier for Camu to guess, you open your mouth wide and take your time enunciating every word.'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: '"I\'ll defeat me horn afternoon"?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'You shake your head, then break down the sentence word by word and mouth each one slowly to Camu.'}
{3: "Camu doesn't seem to understand why you look like you've lost all hope."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Staff Member', 3: 'Friendly reminder: You only need to guess one phrase correctly to clear this challenge.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staff Member', 3: 'You can skip any phrase you struggle with and move on to another phrase.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'You decide to take the advice.'}
{2: 'Next phrase.', 3: '34'}
{2: '"You are very important to me."', 3: '35'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: '"You\'re varying boat ants to me."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'It\'s "important"!', 3: '38'}
{3: "Realizing that speaking with your mouth wide open isn't helping at all, you decide to give gesturing a try."}
{3: "With Camu's eyes on you, you speak while making gestures. You start by pointing at yourself, before drawing something with your fingers around your chest."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: 'Uhmmm. "You\'re really crushing me here"?', 4: '1'}
{3: "...Even the staff member standing nearby can't hold back their laughter."}
{2: "...This is hopeless. I'm out.", 3: '45'}
{3: 'Camu removes his headphones with a hint of irritation, clearly not ready to give up just yet.'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'Watch me shine.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "I refuse to believe we can't get even one phrase right.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'After speaking with the staff member, Camu and you swap roles.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: "The first phrase is super simple. Pretty sure you're gonna get it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: '"I want to always be by your side."', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Says Camu as he makes a few hand gestures.'}
{2: '"I wanna waste by York slide"?', 3: '56', 4: '"I won a race by yo slide"?', 5: '56'}
{2: '"I tasted poop"?', 3: '59', 4: '"I said a loop"?', 5: '59'}
{3: 'Camu now understands exactly how you felt earlier.'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "Let's try a different phrase.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: '"I\'m already full."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'For crying out loud, are you scr...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Staff Member', 3: "Sorry, time's up. Unfortunately, you two did not complete the challenge.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'And with it, the two of you have no choice but to give up.'}
{2: 'Well... guess we make a terrible team?'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: "Nah, don't take it to heart.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "It's just a game. You win some, you lose some.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Sad that we didn't get the voucher, though.", 3: '74'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "What's there to be sad about? Let's go.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Camu points at the food court sign right up ahead.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: 'We can still go to the food court without the voucher.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'What matters is we do all these things together.', 4: '1'}
